name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask Steve - Unlock AI in the Flow of Work for Employees

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create solutions that give employees access to enterprise AI, data and software capabilities in the flow of work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THE LAST MILE UI FOR ENTERPRISE AI

Ask Steve empowers AI, IT, Data and Ops teams to quickly create solutions that give employees access to enterprise AI, data and software capabilities in the flow of work, enabling them to work better and faster.

✅ Works where your employees already are, so they can stay in the flow of work
Unlike product copilots that are limited to a single application, Ask Steve integrates seamlessly into any website or web application. Now your employees can access enterprise AI, data and software capabilities wherever they are.

✅ Can see what the employee is working on, because context matters
Eliminate hours of tedious copying and pasting. Steve can read the current page or text selection and use that as context for your employee's request, saving them time and effort.

✅ Can be personalized for the employee so it's most helpful to them
No more one-size-fits-all copilots
- Customize Skills for specific people, roles or teams
- Add 1-click "aftermarket" buttons to any website or web application
- Enable employees to create their own Skills and Buttons

✅ Gives employees access to multiple systems in one place
Enable your employees to read and write data from your enterprise AI, data and software systems in the flow of work. Now information comes to them, not the other way around. If you can do it via API, you can do it from Ask Steve.

✅ Is a great front-end for RPA and workflow automation
Connect to anything with a Webhook. Write custom code and host your own Webhook, or create one using a workflow automation tool like Zapier, n8n, Make, or Activepieces. Kick off workflows, read and write data from internal and external systems, and more.

✅ Can be implemented quickly with NO CODE
Build and deploy at lightning speed
- Create new Skills in English
- Add Buttons to websites in seconds
- Connect to any LLM: public, private, on-premise or on-computer with no code
- Connect to any Webhook or API with no code
- Easily share Skills and Buttons

✅ Is built for the enterprise - secure, private and customizable by design
Secure, private and customizable by design
- Ask Steve is the only AI browser extension designed for enterprise deployment - it runs on the employee's computer and connects directly to the LLM, Webhook or API that you specify. None of your data is ever sent to or through Ask Steve.
- Customize the Ask Steve experience for your employees with your own branding, custom Skills and Buttons, and more.

*** FREE TO TRY ***
- You get 100 FREE requests right away to try things out.
- After that put in your own FREE Gemini or Mistral API Key, and get FREE UNLIMITED use on our Standard plan. 
- Google and Mistral reserve the right to use your data for training. 

*** PREMIUM PLAN ***
- To keep your data from being used for training, subscribe to our Premium plan to connect to any other LLM provider (OpenAI, Anthropic, Cohere, etc.) where you have an account
- Alternately connect to any on-premise model, to a local model running on your own computer, or to any API or Webhook
- Free 30 day trial with no credit card required

*** PERMISSIONS & YOUR PRIVACY:  ***
We take your privacy seriously. When you install Ask Steve it will ask for permission to "Read and change all your data on all websites". It needs this permission in order to be helpful on any web page. We do not store any of your data. See more details here: https://www.asksteve.to/docs/permissions

*** TRY ASK STEVE TODAY! ***
Read to take your team's productivity to the next level? Install Ask Steve today!
